creator: dparthas@cal.cognizant.com
text:
Hi,
   I am facing a problem with the Appenders. I had to configure two appenders
in order to use two different pattern Layouts. I got a Category  with 
the class name "com.xyz.abc.dataobjects.valueobjects.common.Phone" . In my 
program I tried to get the appenders for the above Category using the call 
a_Category.getAllPpenders (). To my utter surprise the Enumeration returned 
didn't return any appender at all. It should have returned VOA. Have I done 
something wrong in the configuration file ??
Thanking you in advance,
Parthasarathi.

=================================
# Set root category priority to DEBUG and its only appender to A1.
#log4j.debug=true
log4j.rootCategory=DEBUG, A1
log4j.category.com.xyz.abc.dataobjects.valueobjects=DEBUG, VOA
log4j.additivity.com.xyz.abc.dataobjects.valueobjects=false

# A1 and VOA are set to be a FileAppender.
log4j.appender.A1=org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
log4j.appender.VOA=org.apache.log4j.FileAppender

# A1 uses PatternLayout.
log4j.appender.A1.File=/user/MyLogDirectory/MyLogFile
log4j.appender.A1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.A1.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r  %-5p  %x - %m%n

#VOA uses PatternLayout
log4j.appender.VOA.File=/user/MyLogDirectory/MyLogFile
log4j.appender.VOA.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.VOA.layout.ConversionPattern=  %m%n

log4j.category.com.xyz.abc.common.PegasusLogger=ERROR
log4j.category.com.xyz.abc.dataobjects.dataaccessobjects.admin=ERROR
log4j.category.com.xyz.abc.beans.common=WARN
log4j.category.com.xyz.abc.common=ERROR
log4j.category.java.util=ERROR

=================================

This is a user support question not a bug. Please ask your question on the
log4j user list.
